all.description: This view shows all your tasks across all projects. Create your first task to get started with TaskTrove.
all.title: No tasks found

analytics.description: Track your productivity and task completion patterns.
analytics.title: Analytics Dashboard

completed.description: Tasks you've finished will appear here. Complete some tasks to see your progress and celebrate your wins!
completed.title: No completed tasks yet

fallback.description: Create your first task to get started.
fallback.title: No tasks found

inbox.description: This is your default collection point for all new tasks. When you create a task without specifying a project, it lands here.
inbox.title: Your Inbox is empty

label.description: Tasks tagged with this label will appear here. Use labels to categorize and quickly find related tasks.
label.title: No tasks with {{labelName}} label

project.description: This project is empty. Add tasks to organize your work and track progress on specific goals.
project.title: No tasks in {{projectName}}

search.description: Find tasks by title, description, or labels.
search.title: Search Results

today.description: Tasks with today's due date will appear here. Set due dates on your tasks to stay on track with your daily goals.
today.title: Nothing scheduled for today

upcoming.description: Tasks with future due dates show up here, helping you plan ahead and prepare for what's coming next.
upcoming.title: No upcoming tasks
